wikipedia_page.main: James Carson M.D. FRS (1772–1843) was a Scottish physician.

response: *Captain James Carson, pseudonym used by the Stratemeyer Syndicate for the five volume "Saddle Boys" series
*James Carson (American football) (1940–1999), head coach of Jackson State University
*James Carson (musician) (1934–2008), New Zealand tuba player and military band leader
*James Carson (rugby union) (1870–1903), Australian rugby union player
*James Carson (water polo) (1901-1964), American Olympic water polo player
